import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../../navbar/Navbar' import SearchBar from '../../../SearchBar' import addIcon from '../../../../images/icons/PersonButton.png' const Services = () => { const [addBtnVar, setAddBtnVar] = useState('danger') const [editBtnVar, setEditBtnVar] = useState('light') const [viewBtnVar, setViewBtnVar] = useState('light') function handleButtonClick(button) { setAddBtnVar('light') setEditBtnVar('light') setViewBtnVar('light') if (button === 'add') setAddBtnVar('danger') if (button === 'edit') setEditBtnVar('danger') if (button === 'view') setViewBtnVar('danger') } return (

My Account
) } export default Services
